data.text: A lack of field observations limit our knowledge, but intraspecific conflicts are known to sometimes result in injury or death. The screamers (Anhimidae), some jacanas ("Jacana", "Hydrophasianus"), the spur-winged goose ("Plectropterus"), the torrent duck ("Merganetta") and nine species of lapwing ("Vanellus") use a sharp spur on the wing as a weapon. The steamer ducks ("Tachyeres"), geese and swans ("Anserinae"), the solitaire ("Pezophaps"), sheathbills ("Chionis"), some guans ("Crax") and stone curlews ("Burhinus") use a bony knob on the alular metacarpal to punch and hammer opponents. The jacanas "Actophilornis" and "Irediparra" have an expanded, blade-like radius. The extinct "Xenicibis" was unique in having an elongate forelimb and massive hand which likely functioned in combat or defence as a jointed club or flail. Swans, for instance, may strike with the bony spurs and bite when defending eggs or young.
data.translation: 缺乏野外观察限制了我们的知识，但内种竞争在有时会导致伤害或死亡。喷嚏鸟（Anhimidae）、某些桑鹃（"Jacana"、"Hydrophasianus"）、刺腿鹅（"Plectropterus"）、坠水鸭（"Merganetta"）以及九种枫鸡（"Vanellus"）使用翼上的锐利钝角作为武器。蒸汽鸭（"Tachyeres"）、鹅、白鹭（"Anserinae"）、独角鸟（"Pezophaps"）、鸫鹭（"Chionis"）、某些猩猩（"Crax"）和石鸣鸪（"Burhinus"）使用腕部第二钝指骨上的骨头钻击和敲打对手。"Actophilornis"和"Irediparra"的桑鹃有扩展、刀形胸臂。已灭绝的"Xenicibis"独特的特点是有长臂和巨大的手，可能在战斗或防御中以膝盖式棍棒或鞭子的形式运用。例如，白鹭在保护卵或幼小时会用骨头钝角撞击并咬咬。

data.translation: 缺乏实地观察限制了我们的知识，但已知种内冲突有时会导致伤害甚至死亡。尖嘴鸭（Anhimidae）、一些茎鸡属（“Jacana”、“Hydrophasianus”）、刺翅鸭（“Plectropterus”）、激流鸭（“Merganetta”）以及九种麦鸡（“Vanellus”）利用翅膀上的尖刺作为武器。蒸汽鸭（“Tachyeres”）、鹅和天鹅（“Anserinae”）、独行鸟（“Pezophaps”）、鞘嘴鸥（“Chionis”）、一些冠雉（“Crax”）和石鸻（“Burhinus”）则利用翼状掌骨上的骨瘤来冲击和锤击对手。茎鸡属的“Actophilornis”和“Irediparra”拥有扩展的、刀片状的桡骨。已灭绝的“Xenicibis”则独特地拥有一个延长的前肢和巨大的手，很可能在战斗或防御中充当关节棍棒或连枷。例如，天鹅在保护蛋或幼鸟时可能会使用骨刺攻击并啄咬。

data.translation: 由于缺乏野外观察，我们对这些动物的认知有所不足。但是，有时候这些动物之间的种间冲突会造成伤害或者死亡。有刺羽鸟科（Anhimidae）、鹦鹉鸭科（Jacana）、水鸽科（Hydrophasianus）、鸭鹬科（Plectropterus）、湍急鸭科（Merganetta）和九种鹌鹑科（Vanellus）的鸟类，都会利用羽毛上的尖刺作为武器。鹅科（Anserinae）、天鹅科（Tachyeres）和鹅科（Goose）的鸟类，以及鹦鹉科（Pezophaps）、羽毛鸟科（Chionis）、部分羽毛鸟科（Crax）的鸟类和石鹳科（Burhinus）的鸟类，则会利用呈骨质的跖骨掌骨盖骨作为武器，进行攻击或者防御。例如，刺羽鸟科的鸟类“Actophilornis”和“Irediparra”，都有一个扩张的髂骨，类似于锯齿状，可以用来攻击或防御。此外，已灭绝的“Xenicibis”鸟类，有一个长而强壮的前臂，可能是用来进行战斗或防御的。例如，鹅科的鸟类会用羽毛上的尖刺和啄齿来攻击，以保护幼鸟和蛋巢。

data.translation: 缺乏野外观察，使我们对鸟类的行为产生了很大的怀疑，但是，我们知道，有些鸟类有时会因为争斗而受伤或死亡。叫声鸟科（Anhimidae）的游鸟、脚趾鸟科（Jacana）的一些种类、轻翼鸭科（Plectropterus）的轻翼鸭、瀑布鸭科（Merganetta）的瀑布鸭、九种潭鸭科（Vanellus）的潭鸭以及九种潭鸭科（Vanellus）的潭鸭，都会用一把尖利的翅膀羽毛作为武器。飞鸟科（Tachyeres）的飞鸟、鹅科（Anserinae）的鹅、独行鸟科（Pezophaps）的独行鸟、盖鸟科（Chionis）的盖鸟、贯鸟科（Crax）的贯鸟、燕鸥科（Burhinidae）的燕鸥、石鸶科（Charadriidae）的石鸶以及九种燕鸥科的石鸶，都会使用一个坚硬的腕骨作为武器，而灭绝的“Xenicibis”的腕骨很长，它的手腕也很坚硬，可能是一个像铁链子或锤子一样的把手。鹅会用这个坚硬的腕骨来防御卵和幼鸟。

value.text: 大多数浏览器的缓存和历史记录抑制或删除功能在10.2及更早版本中并不影响Flash Player将本地共享对象写入其自己的缓存

data.text: Like the HTTP cookie, a flash cookie (also known as a "Local Shared Object") can be used to save application data. Flash cookies are not shared across domains. An August 2009 study by the Ashkan Soltani and a team of researchers at UC Berkeley found that 50% of websites using Flash were also employing flash cookies, yet privacy policies rarely disclosed them, and user controls for privacy preferences were lacking. Most browsers' cache and history suppress or delete functions did not affect Flash Player's writing Local Shared Objects to its own cache in version 10.2 and earlier, at which point the user community was much less aware of the existence and function of Flash cookies than HTTP cookies. Thus, users with those versions, having deleted HTTP cookies and purged browser history files and caches, may believe that they have purged all tracking data from their computers when in fact Flash browsing history remains. Adobe's own Flash Website Storage Settings panel, a submenu of Adobe's Flash Settings Manager web application, and other editors and toolkits can manage settings for and delete Flash Local Shared Objects.
data.translation: 就像HTTP cookie一样，Flash cookie（也称为“本地共享对象”）可以用来保存应用数据。Flash cookie不会在不同的域之间共享。2009年8月，阿什坎·索尔塔尼（Ashkan Soltani）和加州大学伯克利分校的一个研究小组发现，使用Flash的网站中有50%同时使用了Flash cookie，然而隐私政策很少披露这一点，而且用户对隐私偏好的控制也很缺乏。大多数浏览器的缓存和历史记录抑制或删除功能在10.2及更早版本中并不影响Flash Player将本地共享对象写入其自己的缓存，在那时用户社区对Flash cookie的存在和功能的认识远不如HTTP cookie。因此，那些版本的用户在删除了HTTP cookie并清除了浏览器历史记录文件和缓存后，可能认为他们已经从电脑中清除了所有跟踪数据，但实际上Flash的浏览历史仍然存在。Adobe自己的Flash网站存储设置面板，作为Adobe的Flash设置管理器网络应用的一个子菜单，以及其他编辑器和工具包可以管理和删除Flash本地共享对象的设置。

Thus, users with those versions, having deleted HTTP cookies and purged browser history files and caches, may believe that they have purged all tracking data from their computers when in fact Flash browsing history remains. Adobe's own Flash Website Storage Settings panel, a submenu of Adobe's Flash Settings Manager web application, and other editors and toolkits can manage settings for and delete Flash Local Shared Objects.

data.text: The topography of China has been divided by the Chinese government into five homogeneous physical macro-regions, namely Eastern China (subdivided into the northeast plain, north plain, and southern hills), Xinjiang-Mongolia, and the Tibetan highlands. It is diverse with snow-capped mountains, deep river valleys, broad basins, high plateaus, rolling plains, terraced hills, sandy dunes with many other geographic features and other landforms present in myriad variations. In general, the land is high in the west and descends to the east coast. Mountains (33 percent), plateaus (26 percent) and hills (10 percent) account for nearly 70 percent of the country's land surface. Most of the country's arable land and population are based in lowland plains (12 percent) and basins (19 percent), though some of the greatest basins are filled with deserts. The country's rugged terrain presents problems for the construction of overland transportation infrastructure and requires extensive terracing to sustain agriculture, but is conducive to the development of forestry, mineral and hydropower resources, as well as tourism in the country.
data.translation: 中国的地形，由中国政府分为五个相对统一的物理大宏区，分别是东部中国（分为东北平原、北平原、南方山区）、新疆-蒙古和藏高原。地形多样化，有雪山、深沟、广泽、高平、平原、梯田等各种地形，在各种变化中存在无数的地理特征。一般而言，地势高在西部，逐渐下降到东海岸。山地（33%）、高原（26%）和丘陵（10%）共同占据中国地面的近70%。大多数农田和人口集中在低地平原（12%）和广泽（19%），尽管有些最大的广泽里充满了沙漠。中国的山脉地形对于建设地上运输基础设施带来了问题，需要广泛的梯田来维持农业，但是很适合发展林业、矿业和水电资源，以及国内旅游发展。

In general, the land is high in the west and descends to the east coast. Mountains (33 percent), plateaus (26 percent) and hills (10 percent) account for nearly 70 percent of the country's land surface. Most of the country's arable land and population are based in lowland plains (12 percent) and basins (19 percent), though some of the greatest basins are filled with deserts. The country's rugged terrain presents problems for the construction of overland transportation infrastructure and requires extensive terracing to sustain agriculture, but is conducive to the development of forestry, mineral and hydropower resources, as well as tourism in the country.

data.text: In a 1965 letter to his friend Paul Semonin, Thompson explained an affection for the Industrial Workers of the World, "I have in recent months come to have a certain feeling for Joe Hill and the Wobbly crowd who, if nothing else, had the right idea. But not the right mechanics. I believe the IWW was probably the last human concept in American politics." In another letter to Semonin, Thompson wrote that he agreed with Karl Marx, and compared him to Thomas Jefferson. In a letter to William Kennedy, Thompson confided that he was "coming to view the free enterprise system as the single greatest evil in the history of human savagery." In the documentary "Breakfast with Hunter", Hunter S. Thompson is seen in several scenes wearing different Che Guevara T-shirts. Additionally, actor and friend Benicio del Toro has stated that Thompson kept a "big" picture of Che in his kitchen. Thompson wrote on behalf of African-American rights and the civil rights movement. He strongly criticized the dominance in American society of what he called "white power structures".
data.translation: 在 1965 年写给好友保罗·塞蒙恩的一封信中，汤普森解释了他对工人国际劳工党的情感：“在过去几个月里，我对乔·希尔和工人国际劳工党的成员（他们至少有一个共同点，就是他们‘把握了时代潮流’）产生了某种感情。然而，他们的‘机械’并不够好。我相信工人国际劳工党是美国政治史上最后一个‘人性化’组织。”在另一封信中，他向塞蒙恩表示他同意了卡尔·马克思的观点，并将他与托马斯·杰斐逊相比较。在写给威廉·凯尼迪的一封信中，汤普森透露，他“开始认识到，在历史上，自由市场体系是人类最残忍的‘原始占有主义’的最大推手”。在电影《汤普森与汤普森》中，汤普森在多个场景中都穿着不同的卡斯特罗·埃切弗雷 T 恤。此外，汤普森的好友演员本西西奥·德尔·托罗曾表示，他在厨房里挂着一幅卡斯特罗的大画像。汤普森曾为黑人权利和民权运动发声，并强烈批评美国社会中所谓的“白人权力结构”。

data.translation: 在1965年给朋友保罗·塞蒙宁的一封信中，汤普森解释了他对世界工业工人的喜爱：“近几个月来，我对乔·希尔和那帮摇摆人产生了一种特别的感情，即使没什么别的，至少他们的理念是对的。但他们缺乏正确的执行机制。我认为IWW可能是美国政治中最后一个人性化的概念。” 在另一封给塞蒙宁的信中，汤普森写道，他同意卡尔·马克思的观点，并将他与托马斯·杰斐逊进行了比较。在写给威廉·肯尼迪的信中，汤普森坦言他“开始将自由企业系统视为人类野蛮历史上最大的恶。” 在纪录片《与亨特共进早餐》中，可以看到亨特·S·汤普森在几个场景中穿着不同的切·格瓦拉T恤。此外，演员兼朋友本尼西奥·德尔·托罗表示，汤普森在他的厨房里挂着一幅“大”幅的切的照片。汤普森为非裔美国人权利和民权运动发声，并且强烈批评他所说的美国社会中“白人权力结构”的主导地位。

data.text: In a 1965 letter to his friend Paul Semonin, Thompson explained an affection for the Industrial Workers of the World, "I have in recent months come to have a certain feeling for Joe Hill and the Wobbly crowd who, if nothing else, had the right idea. But not the right mechanics. I believe the IWW was probably the last human concept in American politics." In another letter to Semonin, Thompson wrote that he agreed with Karl Marx, and compared him to Thomas Jefferson. In a letter to William Kennedy, Thompson confided that he was "coming to view the free enterprise system as the single greatest evil in the history of human savagery." In the documentary "Breakfast with Hunter", Hunter S. Thompson is seen in several scenes wearing different Che Guevara T-shirts. Additionally, actor and friend Benicio del Toro has stated that Thompson kept a "big" picture of Che in his kitchen. Thompson wrote on behalf of African-American rights and the civil rights movement. He strongly criticized the dominance in American society of what he called "white power structures".
data.translation: 1965年向朋友叔叔塞莫尼写信时，汤姆森说，他近期对工业工人的世界（IWW）有了某种感情，“我认为Joe Hill和Wobbly团队，如果没有其他方面，他们至少有了正确的想法。但是没有正确的机制。我认为IWW可能是美国政治中的最后一个人类概念。”在另一封向叔叔塞莫尼的信中，汤姆森表示同意卡尔·马克思，并将他比拟为托马斯·杰夫逊。在《早餐与狐狸》文档中，汤姆森多次出现在穿着多种Che Guevara T恤的场景中。此外，朋友和演员贝尼シ奥·德托罗表示，汤姆森在厨房里保留了一张“大”的Che照片。汤姆森支持了黑人权利和民主运动。他严厉地批评了美国社会中的“白色权力结构”的统治。

data.translation: 在1965年给他的朋友保罗·塞蒙宁的信中，汤普森解释了他对世界产业工人的喜爱，“近几个月来，我对乔·希尔和那群乌合之众产生了一定的感情，他们至少有了正确的想法，但却没有正确的机制。我相信，IWW可能是美国政治中最后一个人文概念。” 在另一封给塞蒙宁的信中，汤普森写道他同意卡尔·马克思的观点，并将他与托马斯·杰斐逊进行了比较。在给威廉·肯尼迪的信中，汤普森吐露他“开始将自由企业系统视为人类野蛮历史上单一最大的恶。”在纪录片《与亨特共进早餐》中，可以看到亨特·S·汤普森在几个场景中穿着不同的切·格瓦拉T恤。此外，演员及朋友本尼西奥·德尔·托罗曾表示，汤普森在他的厨房里挂着一幅“大”的切的照片。汤普森曾为非裔美国人权利和民权运动撰写文章。他强烈批评了他所称的美国社会中“白人权力结构”的主导地位。

But not the right mechanics. I believe the IWW was probably the last human concept in American politics." In another letter to Semonin, Thompson wrote that he agreed with Karl Marx, and compared him to Thomas Jefferson. In a letter to William Kennedy, Thompson confided that he was "coming to view the free enterprise system as the single greatest evil in the history of human savagery." data.translation: 在 1965 年给朋友保罗·谢蒙尼的一封信中，汤姆森解释了自己对工人国际工会的一种感情，他说：“近期，我对杰奥·希尔和折腾派人士的感情有了一些变化，他们虽然没有做对的事，但至少是有正确的思想。我认为工人国际工会是美国政治中最后一个人性的东西。”在另一封信中，汤姆森向谢蒙尼表示，他对马克思的观点完全赞同，并且比较了他和托马斯·杰佛逊的风格。在电影《早餐时分与汤姆森》中，汤姆森在不同场景中穿着多种黑格瓦拉的T恤。汤姆森还曾在论文中描述自己对非裔美国人和民权运动的态度，他强烈抨击了美国社会中的“白人权力结构”。

data.text: I ordered the Pink Queen Bikini Set and absolutely loved it. The swimsuit looks just like the photos online and the material was thick, quality and strong-feeling. With such a light-colored top, I worry that swimsuits will appear see-through against my skin tone, but this one had bra padding and was layered and thick enough so that even the cream color did not show my skin. I found the bottoms to be true to size based on the sizing chart but did find that the bandeau top was a little bigger than my frame. However, the adjustable straps came in handy and were so convenient when I wanted to make the top fit better or just take the straps off completely.— Madison Yerke, digital content strategist
data.translation: 我订购了Pink Queen比基尼套装，非常喜欢。泳衣的外观与网上的图片一模一样，材质厚实，质量上乘且手感强。像这样浅色的上衣，我总担心泳衣穿在我身上会显得透，但这款有胸垫，且层次分明，厚度足够，即使是奶油色也不会透出肤色。我发现根据尺寸表，下装的尺寸很准确，但发现抹胸上衣对我的身材来说略大了一些。然而，可调节的肩带非常方便，当我想要让上衣更合身或者完全取下肩带时，它们派上了大用场。— Madison Yerke，数字内容策略师

data.text: A lesbian is a homosexual woman or girl. The word is also used for women in relation to their sexual identity or sexual behavior, regardless of sexual orientation, or as an adjective to characterize or associate nouns with female homosexuality or same-sex attraction. The concept of "lesbian" to differentiate women with a shared sexual orientation evolved in the 20th century. Throughout history, women have not had the same freedom or independence as men to pursue homosexual relationships, but neither have they met the same harsh punishment as gay men in some societies. Instead, lesbian relationships have often been regarded as harmless, unless a participant attempts to assert privileges traditionally enjoyed by men. As a result, little in history was documented to give an accurate description of how female homosexuality was expressed. When early sexologists in the late 19th century began to categorize and describe homosexual behavior, hampered by a lack of knowledge about homosexuality or women's sexuality, they distinguished lesbians as women who did not adhere to female gender roles. They classified them as mentally ill—a designation which has been reversed since the late 20th century in the global scientific community.
data.translation: 女同性恋指的是性取向为同性的女性或女孩。这个词也用于形容女性在性取向和性行为方面的身份或性别认同，不考虑性取向，无论是同性还是异性，它也可用作形容词来描述或与女性同性恋或同性恋倾向相关联的名词。“女同性恋”这个概念是在20世纪中期才形成的，用来区分有相同性取向的女性，她们既不受性别角色的限制，也不受社会的歧视。历史上，女性并没有像男性那样自由自在地寻求同性恋关系，但也没有像男性那样受到相同的残酷惩罚。相反，女性同性恋关系往往被认为是无害的，除非其中一方试图借助以男性为主导的社会中的特权地位来强行占有对方。由于当时性学家在了解女性同性恋行为方面缺乏知识，他们在19世纪末期将女性同性恋者定义为不遵守女性性别角色的女性。这个定义在20世纪末被反驳，在全球科学界，它被视为是医学上的错误诊断。

data.translation: 女同性恋是指女性或女孩中的同性恋者。这个词也用来指涉她们的性身份或性行为，不论她们的性取向如何，亦可作为形容词用以描述或与女同性恋或同性吸引相关联的名词。在20世纪，人们开始用“女同性恋”这一概念来区分有着共同性取向的女性。历史上，女性追求同性恋关系的自由或独立程度并不及男性，但她们在某些社会中也未受到如同性恋男性那样的严厉处罚。通常情况下，女同性恋关系被视作无害，除非参与者试图争取男性所传统享有的权利。因此，历史文献中很少有记录能准确描述女性同性恋如何表示。19世纪末，早期性学家在分类及描述同性恋行为时，由于对同性恋或女性性行为知之甚少，他们将那些不符合女性性别角色的女性界定为女同性恋，并将她们归类为精神病患者——这一分类自20世纪末起在全球科学界已被纠正。

data.text: It is safe tennis. You don’t hit flat shots which have a high risk factor of either going into the net or sailing wide. You don’t look to clear the net by simply a few inches. You play to clear the net by a good few feet. To do that, you have to usually hit constant top spin shots. They sail up above the net, but also come falling down fast after that reach the high point. This either adds depth to a shot, or simply makes the ball bounce high if it lands short. In either scenario, the trajectory of the ball is difficult to tackle, especially because it is not the usual way the ball comes back to a player.
data.translation: 这是安全网球。你不会打平球，那样风险很大，要么打到网子里，要么飞得很远。你不是只想球清一清几英寸就能过网。你是打得足够高过网好几英尺。为了做到这点，通常要打带旋转的球。它们飞过网顶后会很快下落。这要么让球飞更深，要么让球在落地时反弹较高。无论哪种情况，球的轨迹都难以应对，特别是因为它并非球员通常期待的回球方式。

data.text: In Europe, rates of tuberculosis began to rise in the early 1600s to a peak level in the 1800s, when it caused nearly 25% of all deaths. In the 18th and 19th century, tuberculosis had become epidemic in Europe, showing a seasonal pattern. Tuberculosis caused widespread public concern in the 19th and early 20th centuries as the disease became common among the urban poor. In 1815, one in four deaths in England was due to "consumption". By 1918, TB still caused one in six deaths in France. After TB was determined to be contagious, in the 1880s, it was put on a notifiable-disease list in Britain; campaigns started to stop people from spitting in public places, and the infected poor were "encouraged" to enter sanatoria that resembled prisons (the sanatoria for the middle and upper classes offered excellent care and constant medical attention). Whatever the benefits of the "fresh air" and labor in the sanatoria, even under the best conditions, 50% of those who entered died within five years ( 1916).
data.translation: 在欧洲，结核病的发病率从17世纪初开始上升，并在19世纪达到高峰，那时几乎有25%的死亡率与此病相关。18世纪和19世纪期间，结核病在欧洲爆发成流行病，并呈现出明显的季节性规律。到了19世纪及20世纪初，随着该病在城市贫民中的广泛传播，社会上对此产生了极大的关注。1815年，英格兰有四分之一的死亡案例归因于“肺痨”。到1918年，结核病在法国的死亡比例仍占六分之一。在1880年代确定结核病具有传染性后，英国将其列入传染病通报名单；开始倡导人们不要在公共场所吐痰，并“鼓励”被感染的贫困人群进入类似监狱的疗养院（相对而言，中上阶级的疗养院提供了优越的护理和持续的医疗关注）。尽管疗养院提供“新鲜空气”及劳动所带来的种种益处，即便在最佳环境下，1916年入住疗养院的患者中仍有50%在五年内去世。

value.text: 19世纪及20世纪初，随着这种疾病在城市贫民中变得普遍，引起了广泛的公众关注

In the 18th and 19th century, tuberculosis had become epidemic in Europe, showing a seasonal pattern. Tuberculosis caused widespread public concern in the 19th and early 20th centuries as the disease became common among the urban poor. In 1815, one in four deaths in England was due to "consumption". By 1918, TB still caused one in six deaths in France. After TB was determined to be contagious, in the 1880s, it was put on a notifiable-disease list in Britain; campaigns started to stop people from spitting in public places, and the infected poor were "encouraged" to enter sanatoria that resembled prisons (the sanatoria for the middle and upper classes offered excellent care and constant medical attention). data.text: The misuse of deepfake technology by malicious actors poses a potential threat to nations, societies, and individuals. However, existing methods for detecting deepfakes primarily focus on uncompressed videos, such as noise characteristics, local textures, or frequency statistics. When applied to compressed videos, these methods experience a decrease in detection performance and are less suitable for real-world scenarios. In this paper, we propose a deepfake video detection method based on 3D spatiotemporal trajectories. Specifically, we utilize a robust 3D model to construct spatiotemporal motion features, integrating feature details from both 2D and 3D frames to mitigate the influence of large head rotation angles or insufficient lighting within frames. Furthermore, we separate facial expressions from head movements and design a sequential analysis method based on phase space motion trajectories to explore the feature differences between genuine and fake faces in deepfake videos. We conduct extensive experiments to validate the performance of our proposed method on several compressed deepfake benchmarks. The robustness of the well-designed features is verified by calculating the consistent distribution of facial landmarks before and after video compression.Our method yields satisfactory results and showcases its potential for practical applications.
data.translation: 深度仿真技术的不当使用可能会对国家、社会和个人构成潜在威胁。但是，目前检测深度仿冒视频的方法主要集中在解压视频上，例如噪音特征、局部纹理或频率统计。当应用于压缩视频时，这些方法的检测性能会下降，并不适合实际应用场景。本文提出了一种基于3D空间时间轨迹的深度仿冒视频检测方法。具体来说，我们利用一个强健的3D模型来构建空间时间运动特征，将2D和3D帧中的特征细节融合在一起，以抵消大头部旋转角度或帧内不足光照的影响。此外，我们将面部表情从头部运动分离开，并基于轨迹空间运动轨迹设计了一个顺序分析方法，以探索真实和仿冒面部在深度仿冒视频中的特征差异。我们在几个压缩深度仿冒基准上进行了广泛的实验，以验证我们所提出的方法的性能。我们通过计算视频压缩前后面部关键点的一致分布来验证设计得很好的特征的鲁棒性。我们的方法表现得很好，并展示了对实际应用的潜力。

Furthermore, we separate facial expressions from head movements and design a sequential analysis method based on phase space motion trajectories to explore the feature differences between genuine and fake faces in deepfake videos. We conduct extensive experiments to validate the performance of our proposed method on several compressed deepfake benchmarks. The robustness of the well-designed features is verified by calculating the consistent distribution of facial landmarks before and after video compression.Our method yields satisfactory results and showcases its potential for practical applications.
data.translation: 恶意行为者滥用深度伪造技术对国家、社会和个人构成潜在威胁。然而，现有用于检测深度伪造的方法主要集中在未压缩视频上，如噪音特征、局部纹理或频率统计。当应用于压缩视频时，这些方法的检测性能会下降，并不适用于实际场景。在本文中，我们提出了一种基于3D时空轨迹的深度伪造视频检测方法。具体来说，我们利用强大的3D模型构建时空运动特征，整合来自2D和3D帧的特征细节，以减轻大头部旋转角度或帧内照明不足对其的影响。此外，我们将面部表情与头部运动分离，并设计了基于相空间运动轨迹的顺序分析方法，以探索深度伪造视频中真实和伪造人脸之间的特征差异。我们进行了大量实验证实我们的方法在多个压缩深度伪造基准上的性能。通过计算视频压缩前后面部标记点的一致分布，验证了设计良好特征的稳健性。我们的方法得到了令人满意的结果，展示了其在实际应用中的潜力。

When applied to compressed videos, these methods experience a decrease in detection performance and are less suitable for real-world scenarios. In this paper, we propose a deepfake video detection method based on 3D spatiotemporal trajectories. Specifically, we utilize a robust 3D model to construct spatiotemporal motion features, integrating feature details from both 2D and 3D frames to mitigate the influence of large head rotation angles or insufficient lighting within frames. Furthermore, we separate facial expressions from head movements and design a sequential analysis method based on phase space motion trajectories to explore the feature differences between genuine and fake faces in deepfake videos. We conduct extensive experiments to validate the performance of our proposed method on several compressed deepfake benchmarks. The robustness of the well-designed features is verified by calculating the consistent distribution of facial landmarks before and after video compression.Our method yields satisfactory results and showcases its potential for practical applications.

data.translation: 即便是有恶意行为者滥用深度伪造技术，它也带来了一定的风险，影响到国家、社会和个人。但是，目前的深度伪造检测方法主要集中在识别未压缩的视频中，它们针对的是特定的噪音特征、局部纹理特征或者频谱统计特征。但是，当应用于压缩视频时，这些方法的检测性能会下降，在实际场景中也不太适用。本文提出了一种基于三维空间和时间轴的深度伪造视频检测方法。它利用了一个坚固的三维模型来构建空间和时间的运动特征，并将2D和3D框架中的细节信息相结合，从而减小了大头旋转角度或者缺乏光线的影响。此外，我们还将表情与头部运动分离开来，并设计了一种采用相对空间运动轨迹的顺序分析方法，从而对深度伪造视频中的真实面部和恶意面部特征进行检测。我们进行了大量的实验，验证了我们的方法在几个深度伪造压缩视频的测试集中的性能。我们的方法表现出了满意的检测性能，具有实际应用的潜力。

data.text: The remake of which was supposed to be released on December 18 of this year, but, due to the pandemic, has been pushed back to October of next year. December 18 of this year is the last day of school before Christmas break for me and the kids. For the last five years, my wife has been buying me movie tickets for a date night for just us to a movie of my choice at the fancy 21+ movie theater in town… the theater with love seats instead of regular seats, and a bar in the back, and the best accommodation of all: no teenagers. We’ve seen some of the new Star Wars movies and the re-release of Titanic this way. It’s the only thing that gets me into a theater anymore… not the movies, but the date night with my wife.
data.translation: 本年底的12月18日，原本要在那天发布改编版的电影，但由于疫情，已经推迟到下一年10月。12月18日是我和孩子们的学校年末假期之前的日子，过去五年，我的妻子每年都会为我买一张电影票，让我们在城镇那家21岁以上的奢华电影院一起出去，看我选择的电影，这家电影院有爱心座位，不像常规座位，还有一个后厨，最好的是没有 teenager。我们曾经这样看过新的星球大战电影和《天空航母》重新发行版。只有这种方式，才能让我再次进入电影院...不是电影，而是与妻子的约会。

Like any connoisseur, if you know your Birks, you would be aware that nearly all the EVA options are monochromatic, so it’s obvious with the Funkymonkey’s white buckles that they are not the originals. Other than that, at first glance, you’ll have a hard time telling these sandals apart. They both have a double buckle, they’re both crafted from the same lightweight EVA material and they both have moldable footpads with what looks to be the same raised arch support on the footbeds (more on this below).
data.translation: 我订购了两双绿色系的鞋子：Birkenstock的淡黄绿色和Funkymonkey的荧光绿色。就像任何行家一样，如果你了解你的Birks，你就会知道几乎所有的EVA款式都是单色的，因此很明显，带有白色扣子的Funkymonkey并非原装。除此之外，乍一看，你很难区分这两双凉鞋。它们都有双扣设计，都是用同样的轻便EVA材料制成，而且它们都有可塑形的足垫，脚床上似乎都有相同的提高的足弓支撑（详见下文）。

data.text: Humans love sour tastes, too. A sour taste often indicates the presence of ascorbic acid — vitamin C, which humans have evolved an inability to make in their own bodies (a trait they inherited from their proto-ape ancestors, and also share with tarsiers, other monkeys and apes, guinea pigs, capybaras, and some bats). I mention tarsiers because some people have tried to imply that this indicates an herbivorous or frugivorous diet, but it is just a holdover from a prior species that was frugivorous. Tarsiers are pretty strict insectivores — carnivores, not omnivores like us. So lacking the ability to make vitamin C says nothing about our diet.
data.translation: 人类也喜欢酸味。酸味通常表明抗坏血酸存在——也就是维生素C，而人类进化出了无法在自己体内合成的特征（这一特征是从原始类人猿祖先那里继承来的，同时也与狐猴、其他猴子和类人猿、豚鼠、水豚和一些蝙蝠共享）。我提到狐猴是因为有些人试图暗示这表明了草食或果食性饮食，但实际上这只是前一物种果食性的残留特征。狐猴其实是非常严格的食虫动物——食肉动物，与我们不同，并不是杂食动物。因此，缺乏合成维生素C的能力对我们的饮食无关。

data.text: Humans love sour tastes, too. A sour taste often indicates the presence of ascorbic acid — vitamin C, which humans have evolved an inability to make in their own bodies (a trait they inherited from their proto-ape ancestors, and also share with tarsiers, other monkeys and apes, guinea pigs, capybaras, and some bats). I mention tarsiers because some people have tried to imply that this indicates an herbivorous or frugivorous diet, but it is just a holdover from a prior species that was frugivorous. data.translation: 人类也喜欢吃酸味的食物。酸味通常表示含有维生素C的食物，这种食物对人类来说是不可或缺的，但是人类的身体并不能自行合成这种维生素。人类在进化过程中便逐渐丧失了这种能力，这种遗传特征也是从猿猴的原始祖先那里遗传而来（它们也同样是猴子和猿类的祖先，还有裸鼠、鲨鱼、蚂蚁、巨蜥和其他一些雀形目动物），而且这种特征也与其他猴类、猿类、裸鼠、鲨鱼、蚂蚁、巨蜥和雀形目动物一样，与吃蔬菜和植物性食物无关。考虑到塔里西亚猴是一种严格的昆虫食者（而不是杂食动物），所以它们体内缺乏维生素C也说明了什么？说明什么？它说明了一种进化过程，而不是食物类型。

data.translation: 人类也喜欢酸味。酸味通常表示存在抗坏血酸 — 维生素 C，人类在自己的体内无法产生这种维生素（这是一种他们从原始猿祖先那里继承而来的特质，也与狐猴、其他猴子和猿类、豚鼠、水獭和一些蝙蝠共同拥有）。我提到狐猴是因为有些人试图暗示这表明草食或果食性饮食，但这只是先前果食物种的残留。狐猴是相当严格的食虫动物 — 肉食动物，而不像我们一样是杂食动物。因此，缺乏制造维生素 C 的能力并不代表我们的饮食。

data.text: Humans love sour tastes, too. A sour taste often indicates the presence of ascorbic acid — vitamin C, which humans have evolved an inability to make in their own bodies (a trait they inherited from their proto-ape ancestors, and also share with tarsiers, other monkeys and apes, guinea pigs, capybaras, and some bats). I mention tarsiers because some people have tried to imply that this indicates an herbivorous or frugivorous diet, but it is just a holdover from a prior species that was frugivorous. Tarsiers are pretty strict insectivores — carnivores, not omnivores like us. So lacking the ability to make vitamin C says nothing about our diet.
data.translation: 人类也喜欢酸味。酸味通常表明有抗坏血酸——维生素C的存在，而人类已经进化到无法自身合成维生素C（这一特征是从我们的始祖类人猿那里继承来的，也与眼镜猴、其他猴子和猿类、豚鼠、水豚以及某些蝙蝠共有）。我之所以提到眼镜猴，是因为一些人曾试图暗示这表明了一种草食性或果食性的饮食习惯，但这其实只是一种来自之前果食性物种的遗留特征。眼镜猴是严格的食虫者——肉食者，而不是像我们这样的杂食者。所以，缺乏自身合成维生素C的能力并不说明我们的饮食习惯。

value.text: 在决策情景下实现机器学习算法的有效性是一个非常重要的因素

data.text: The key factor in implementing machine learning algorithms in decision-making situations is not only the accuracy of the model but also its confidence level. The confidence level of a model in a classification problem is often given by the output vector of a softmax function for convenience. However, these values are known to deviate significantly from the actual expected model confidence. This problem is called model calibration and has been studied extensively. One of the simplest techniques to tackle this task is focal loss, a generalization of cross-entropy by introducing one positive parameter. Although many related studies exist because of the simplicity of the idea and its formalization, the theoretical analysis of its behavior is still insufficient. In this study, our objective is to understand the behavior of focal loss by reinterpreting this function geometrically. Our analysis suggests that focal loss reduces the curvature of the loss surface in training the model. This indicates that curvature may be one of the essential factors in achieving model calibration. We design numerical experiments to support this conjecture to reveal the behavior of focal loss and the relationship between calibration performance and curvature.
data.translation: 在决策情景下实现机器学习算法的有效性是一个非常重要的因素，不仅要考虑模型的准确性，还要考虑模型的信心度。在分类问题中，模型的信心度通常可以通过输出向量得到，而这些值常常会与实际预期的模型信心度有很大的偏差。这种情况被称为“模型验证”，它已经得到了很多研究，因为这是一个非常简单的问题，而且其理论分析也很完善。在本文中，我们的目标是通过重新定义函数的形式来理解聚焦损失函数，从而解释其行为。我们的分析表明，聚焦损失函数减少了损失表面的曲率，从而表明曲率可能是实现模型验证的重要因素。我们设计了一些实验，以支持我们的猜想，即模型验证与曲率之间可能存在关联。我们还设计了一些实验来研究聚焦损失函数与曲率之间的关系。

data.translation: 在决策过程中实施机器学习算法的关键因素不仅仅在于模型的准确性，还包括其置信度。通常情况下，为了便于处理，分类问题中的模型置信度常由 Softmax 函数的输出向量给出。然而，这些值与模型实际预期的置信度存在显著偏差。这种现象称为模型校准，已有大量相关研究。其中一个最简单的解决方案是焦点损失法，该方法通过引入一个正参数对交叉熵进行了推广。尽管该理念及其形式化的简单性导致了众多相关研究，但对其行为的理论分析仍显不足。本研究旨在通过几何角度重新解释焦点损失函数来理解其行为。我们的分析提示，焦点损失能够降低训练模型时损失表面的曲率。这表明曲率可能是实现模型校准的关键因素之一。为验证这一假设，我们设计了数值实验，探讨了焦点损失的行为及其与校准性能和曲率之间的关联。

data.translation: 在决策情况下实施机器学习算法的关键因素不仅是模型的准确性，还包括其置信度。为了方便，分类问题中模型的置信度通常由 Softmax 函数的输出向量给出。然而，这些值被认为与实际预期的模型置信度有显著偏差。这个问题被称为模型校准，并已被广泛研究。处理这一任务的最简单技术之一是焦点损失，这是通过引入一个正参数来推广交叉熵。尽管由于这一理念及其形式化的简单性，存在许多相关研究，但对其行为的理论分析仍然不足。在这项研究中，我们的目标是通过重新解释这个函数的几何形态来理解焦点损失的行为。我们的分析表明，焦点损失减少了训练模型时损失表面的曲率。这表明曲率可能是实现模型校准的关键因素之一。我们设计数值实验来支持这一猜想，揭示焦点损失的行为以及校准性能与曲率之间的关系。

data.translation: 在决策过程中应用机器学习算法的关键因素之一是模型的准确性和信心程度。在分类问题中，模型的信心程度通常用软概率映射函数的输出向量来表示，但这些值通常与实际模型信心程度存在较大偏差。这个问题被称为模型校准，已经受到了广泛关注。在这方面，最简单的解决方案之一就是“焦点损失”，它是基于交叉熵概念扩展而来的，其中加入了一个正数参数。虽然由于这种方法的简单性和形式化表达，已有大量相关研究，但对其行为的理论分析还不够充分。本研究的目的是对焦点损失进行几何上的再解释，以便了解其行为特性。我们的分析表明，焦点损失可以使模型在训练过程中降低损失曲面的曲率，这表明曲率可能是实现模型校准的重要因素之一。为了验证这一假设，我们设计了数值实验，旨在揭示焦点损失的行为特性，以及曲率与校准性能之间的关系。

value.text: 并非复制人是恶魔

data.text: But what gradually emerges, going along, is that the replicants aren't the monsters. As violent as the “skinjobs” are, you are meant to figure out that these are in fact runaway slaves. They're fleeing pursuit, trying to put a stop to their evil creators, and gain some hope of future out of all of this. data.text: Cross-lingual continual pre-training of large language models (LLMs) initially trained on English corpus allows us to leverage the vast amount of English language resources and reduce the pre-training cost. In this study, we constructed Swallow, an LLM with enhanced Japanese capability, by extending the vocabulary of Llama 2 to include Japanese characters and conducting continual pre-training on a large Japanese web corpus. Experimental results confirmed that the performance on Japanese tasks drastically improved through continual pre-training, and the performance monotonically increased with the amount of training data up to 100B tokens. Consequently, Swallow achieved superior performance compared to other LLMs that were trained from scratch in English and Japanese. An analysis of the effects of continual pre-training revealed that it was particularly effective for Japanese question answering tasks. Furthermore, to elucidate effective methodologies for cross-lingual continual pre-training from English to Japanese, we investigated the impact of vocabulary expansion and the effectiveness of incorporating parallel corpora. The results showed that the efficiency gained through vocabulary expansion had no negative impact on performance, except for the summarization task, and that the combined use of parallel corpora enhanced translation ability.
data.translation: 跨语言持续预训练大语言模型（LLMs），这些模型最初在英语语料库上进行训练，使我们能够利用大量的英语语言资源并降低预训练成本。在这项研究中，我们构建了“Swallow”，这是一个具有增强日语能力的LLM，通过扩展Llama 2的词汇表以包括日语字符，并在大型日语网络语料库上进行持续性预训练。实验结果证实，通过持续性预训练，日语任务的性能显著提高，且性能随着训练数据量的增加而单调增加，最高可达1000亿个标记。因此，“Swallow”在英语和日语方面均表现出色，胜过其他从头开始英语和日语训练的LLMs。对于持续性预训练效果的分析发现，它在日语问答任务中特别有效。此外，为了阐明从英语到日语的跨语言持续性预训练的有效方法，我们研究了词汇扩展的影响以及并入平行语料库的有效性。结果显示，通过词汇扩展获得的效率对性能没有负面影响，除了摘要任务外，并且并行语料库的综合使用增强了翻译能力。

data.translation: 跨语言持续预训练大型语言模型（LLMs），最初基于英文语料库进行训练，使我们能够充分利用丰富的英语资源并降低预训练成本。在本研究中，我们通过扩充Llama 2的词汇库，加入日语字符，并在大型日文网络语料库上进行持续预训练，构建了一款增强型日语能力的大型语言模型Swallow。实验结果表明，通过持续预训练，日语任务的性能得到了显著提升，且性能随着训练数据量增至1000亿令牌而单调递增。因此，相较于从头开始用英语和日语训练的其他LLMs，Swallow展现出了优越的性能。对持续预训练效果的分析显示，它在日语问答任务中特别有效。此外，为了探究从英语到日语的跨语言持续预训练的有效策略，我们研究了词汇扩充的影响及并行语料库整合的效用。研究结果表明，词汇扩充提升了效率，且除了摘要任务外不影响性能，而并行语料库的使用则显著增强了翻译能力。

data.translation: 跨语言持续预训练大型语言模型（LLMs），初始时基于英语语料库训练，使我们能够利用丰富的英语资源并降低预训练成本。在本研究中，我们通过扩展Llama 2的词汇表以包括日语字符，并在大型日语网络语料库上进行持续预训练，构建了具有增强日语能力的LLM——Swallow。实验结果证实，通过持续预训练，日语任务的表现得到了显著改善，并且随着训练数据量增加至1000亿令牌，表现呈单调增加。因此，Swallow的表现超过了从头开始用英语和日语训练的其他LLMs。对持续预训练效果的分析显示，它特别适用于日语问答任务。此外，为了阐明从英语到日语的跨语言持续预训练的有效方法，我们研究了词汇扩展的影响以及并行语料库并入的效果。结果表明，词汇扩展带来的效率提升并未对性能产生负面影响，除了总结任务外，而并行语料库的联合使用提升了翻译能力。

data.text: Cross-lingual continual pre-training of large language models (LLMs) initially trained on English corpus allows us to leverage the vast amount of English language resources and reduce the pre-training cost. In this study, we constructed Swallow, an LLM with enhanced Japanese capability, by extending the vocabulary of Llama 2 to include Japanese characters and conducting continual pre-training on a large Japanese web corpus. Experimental results confirmed that the performance on Japanese tasks drastically improved through continual pre-training, and the performance monotonically increased with the amount of training data up to 100B tokens. Consequently, Swallow achieved superior performance compared to other LLMs that were trained from scratch in English and Japanese. An analysis of the effects of continual pre-training revealed that it was particularly effective for Japanese question answering tasks. Furthermore, to elucidate effective methodologies for cross-lingual continual pre-training from English to Japanese, we investigated the impact of vocabulary expansion and the effectiveness of incorporating parallel corpora. The results showed that the efficiency gained through vocabulary expansion had no negative impact on performance, except for the summarization task, and that the combined use of parallel corpora enhanced translation ability.
data.translation: 通过对大型语言模型（LLM）在英语训练集上的持续预训练，我们可以充分利用英语语言资源，并大大降低预训练成本。本文中，我们构建了一个具有增强日语功能的LLM，扩展了Llama 2的词汇表，并对一个大型日语互联网训练集进行持续预训练。实验结果表明，通过持续预训练，日语任务的表现大幅提升，并且随着训练数据量的增加，表现曲线呈现级进式增长，在100亿条训练数据的情况下，表现优于英语和日语从零开始训练的其他LLM。在分析持续预训练的效果时，我们发现，持续预训练对日语问答任务效果最为明显，并且进行了对持续预训练的效果进行了分析，发现在词汇扩展方面，虽然会降低表现，但对于摘要任务和翻译任务，效果却是积极的，并且在使用并行训练集的情况下，表现更加突出。

data.translation: 对于初始训练在英文词库上的大型语言模型（LLMs），通过跨语言的连续预训练，使得我们能够利用大量的英语语言资源，并降低了预训练成本。本研究中，我们通过对LLama 2的词库进行扩展，使其包含日语字符，并对日本大规模的互联网词汇库进行连续预训练，从而显著提高了对日语任务的表现。实验结果证明，通过连续预训练的表现比其他从零开始训练的LLMs在英语和日语任务上表现更好。通过对连续预训练的效果进行分析，我们发现它对日语问答任务尤其有效。我们还进行了对跨语言连续预训练效果的分析，并证明了扩展词库并使用同义语词库的方法对表现有积极影响，但对总结任务的表现并没有明显的负面影响。

data.translation: 跨语言持续预训练大型语言模型（LLMs），初始训练基于英语语料库，这使我们能够利用丰富的英语资源并降低预训练成本。在本研究中，我们通过扩展Llama 2的词汇表以包括日语字符，并对大型日语网络语料库进行持续预训练，构建了一种具有增强日语能力的大型语言模型Swallow。实验结果确认，通过持续预训练，日语任务的性能显著提升，且随着训练数据量的增加至100B令牌，性能单调增加。因此，与从零开始用英语和日语训练的其他LLMs相比，Swallow实现了卓越的性能。对持续预训练效果的分析揭示，它对日语问答任务尤其有效。此外，为了阐明从英语到日语的跨语言持续预训练的有效方法论，我们研究了词汇扩展的影响和并行语料库整合的有效性。结果显示，词汇扩展带来的效率提升对性能没有负面影响，除了摘要任务外，而并行语料库的组合使用增强了翻译能力。

data.text: Cross-lingual continual pre-training of large language models (LLMs) initially trained on English corpus allows us to leverage the vast amount of English language resources and reduce the pre-training cost. In this study, we constructed Swallow, an LLM with enhanced Japanese capability, by extending the vocabulary of Llama 2 to include Japanese characters and conducting continual pre-training on a large Japanese web corpus. Experimental results confirmed that the performance on Japanese tasks drastically improved through continual pre-training, and the performance monotonically increased with the amount of training data up to 100B tokens. Consequently, Swallow achieved superior performance compared to other LLMs that were trained from scratch in English and Japanese. An analysis of the effects of continual pre-training revealed that it was particularly effective for Japanese question answering tasks. Furthermore, to elucidate effective methodologies for cross-lingual continual pre-training from English to Japanese, we investigated the impact of vocabulary expansion and the effectiveness of incorporating parallel corpora. The results showed that the efficiency gained through vocabulary expansion had no negative impact on performance, except for the summarization task, and that the combined use of parallel corpora enhanced translation ability.
data.translation: 跨语言连续预训练大语言模型（LLMs），初步在英文资源集合上训练，可以帮助我们充分利用英语语言资源，并降低预训练成本。在本研究中，我们构建了一款具有增强了日语功能的LLM，称为Swallow，通过扩展Llama 2的词表包含日文字符，并在大型日文网络资源上进行连续预训练来实现此目的。实验结果表明，通过连续预训练，日语任务的表现显著提高，并且表现随着训练数据量的增加而逐渐增加，直到达到100B tokens。因此，Swallow表现优于从头开始在英文和日文上训练的其他LLMs。对连续预训练的影响分析表明，它尤其有效于日语问答任务。为了理解从英文到日文的跨语言连续预训练有效方法，我们研究了扩展词表的影响和并行语料的有效性。结果表明，扩展词表的效率没有影响表现，除了摘要任务以外，并行语料的合并可以提高翻译能力。

data.text: A couple minutes before dinner, I went to wash my hands and came back and everyone was seated in their chairs at the dinner table with china, silverware and glasses. They had a place setting for me with a paper plate, plastic utensils and a stool at an awkward corner of the table. They had more chairs and more dishes and silverware, but chose to treat me worse than themselves. I was raised to always give guests the best of what I had, so I felt especially bad sitting there on a hard stool eating with my paper and plastic while everyone else had dishes and silverware.
data.translation: 快到晚餐时间，我起身去洗手，回来时发现每个人都已就坐在餐桌旁，桌上摆放着瓷器、银具和玻璃杯。他们替我预留了一个位置，上面摆着纸盘、塑料餐具，并在餐桌的一处尴尬角落放了一把凳子。虽然他们手边还有更多椅子和餐具，却选择待我如此不周。我自小受教要以最好的款待客人，所以坐在那里用纸盘和塑料餐具就餐时，感到特别不安，而其他人却享用着盘子和银具。

data.translation: 今年，我开始慢慢淘汰我的比基尼，寻找一件年龄合适的一件式泳装并不让我看起来像是被塞进香肠衣中是很困难的。我特别喜欢这款 Rxrxcoco 泳装，因为它的褶皱掉落在完美的位置，更好地增强了我的躯干（并且隐藏了坐下时可能会露出的那个令人不快的小肚腩）。我最初订购了一个大号，因为我的胸罩尺码是 34 DD，但它对我来说太大了，所以我不得不改成中号，结果正合适。总的来说，不到 50 美元，有着各种不同颜色选择，我会推荐这款泳装适用于各种体型。— 托比·格鲁梅特·西格尔，健康、健身和美食编辑

value.text: 不必然保证安全
根据遵循人类直觉的属性
为平衡责任方通过失衡结算机制中的能源套利减少成本提供了新的机会

data.text: A continuous rise in the penetration of renewable energy sources, along with the use of the single imbalance pricing, provides a new opportunity for balance responsible parties to reduce their cost through energy arbitrage in the imbalance settlement mechanism. Model-free reinforcement learning (RL) methods are an appropriate choice for solving the energy arbitrage problem due to their outstanding performance in solving complex stochastic sequential problems. However, RL is rarely deployed in real-world applications since its learned policy does not necessarily guarantee safety during the execution phase. In this paper, we propose a new RL-based control framework for batteries to obtain a safe energy arbitrage strategy in the imbalance settlement mechanism. In our proposed control framework, the agent initially aims to optimize the arbitrage revenue. Subsequently, in the post-processing step, we correct (constrain) the learned policy following a knowledge distillation process based on properties that follow human intuition. Our post-processing step is a generic method and is not restricted to the energy arbitrage domain. We use the Belgian imbalance price of 2023 to evaluate the performance of our proposed framework. Furthermore, we deploy our proposed control framework on a real battery to show its capability in the real world.
data.translation: 可再生能源渗透率的持续增长，以及单一失衡定价的使用，为平衡责任方通过失衡结算机制中的能源套利减少成本提供了新的机会。因其在解决复杂随机序列问题方面的卓越性能，无模型强化学习（RL）方法是解决能源套利问题的合适选择。然而，由于RL学习的策略在执行阶段不必然保证安全，所以它很少在实际应用中部署。在本文中，我们提出了一个新的基于RL的电池控制框架，以在失衡结算机制中获得安全的能源套利策略。在我们提出的控制框架中，代理最初旨在优化套利收入。随后，在后处理步骤中，我们根据遵循人类直觉的属性，通过知识蒸馏过程对学到的策略进行修正（约束）。我们的后处理步骤是一种通用方法，并不仅限于能源套利领域。我们使用2023年的比利时失衡价格来评估我们提出的框架的性能。此外，我们还在真实的电池上部署了我们的控制框架，以展示其在现实世界中的能力。

data.text: A continuous rise in the penetration of renewable energy sources, along with the use of the single imbalance pricing, provides a new opportunity for balance responsible parties to reduce their cost through energy arbitrage in the imbalance settlement mechanism. Model-free reinforcement learning (RL) methods are an appropriate choice for solving the energy arbitrage problem due to their outstanding performance in solving complex stochastic sequential problems. However, RL is rarely deployed in real-world applications since its learned policy does not necessarily guarantee safety during the execution phase. In this paper, we propose a new RL-based control framework for batteries to obtain a safe energy arbitrage strategy in the imbalance settlement mechanism. In our proposed control framework, the agent initially aims to optimize the arbitrage revenue. Subsequently, in the post-processing step, we correct (constrain) the learned policy following a knowledge distillation process based on properties that follow human intuition. Our post-processing step is a generic method and is not restricted to the energy arbitrage domain. We use the Belgian imbalance price of 2023 to evaluate the performance of our proposed framework. Furthermore, we deploy our proposed control framework on a real battery to show its capability in the real world.
data.translation: 随着可再生能源的逐步渗透，以及使用单向不平衡定价机制，负责平衡责任的各方可以通过能源价格差异化机制进行能源套利，从而降低成本。由于模型自由的强化学习（RL）算法在解决复杂随机序列问题方面的优异表现，因此它是一种适用于能源套利问题的理想算法。然而，由于RL算法的学习过程并不能保证执行阶段的安全，因此在实际应用中，它很少使用。为了解决这一问题，我们提出了一种新的RL算法控制框架，用于在能源套利机制中获得安全的能源套利策略。在我们提出的控制框架中，首先，启动阶段，智能体的目标是优化套利收入。然后，在后处理阶段，我们基于人类直觉所蕴含的知识进行信息抽取，并对智能体学习的策略进行修正（或约束）。该后处理阶段的方法是一种通用的方法，不仅适用于能源套利领域，还可应用于其他领域。我们采用了2023年比利时的不平衡定价价格作为评估案例，证明了我们的控制框架的有效性。此外，我们还在一台实际的电池上运行了我们的控制框架，以表明其在实际世界中的可行性。

value.text: 通过能源套利在不平衡结算机制中降低成本的新机遇

data.text: A continuous rise in the penetration of renewable energy sources, along with the use of the single imbalance pricing, provides a new opportunity for balance responsible parties to reduce their cost through energy arbitrage in the imbalance settlement mechanism. Model-free reinforcement learning (RL) methods are an appropriate choice for solving the energy arbitrage problem due to their outstanding performance in solving complex stochastic sequential problems. However, RL is rarely deployed in real-world applications since its learned policy does not necessarily guarantee safety during the execution phase. In this paper, we propose a new RL-based control framework for batteries to obtain a safe energy arbitrage strategy in the imbalance settlement mechanism. In our proposed control framework, the agent initially aims to optimize the arbitrage revenue. Subsequently, in the post-processing step, we correct (constrain) the learned policy following a knowledge distillation process based on properties that follow human intuition. Our post-processing step is a generic method and is not restricted to the energy arbitrage domain. We use the Belgian imbalance price of 2023 to evaluate the performance of our proposed framework. Furthermore, we deploy our proposed control framework on a real battery to show its capability in the real world.
data.translation: 可再生能源来源的渗透率持续增加，结合单一的不平衡定价机制，为平衡责任方提供了通过能源套利在不平衡结算机制中降低成本的新机遇。无模型强化学习（RL）方法是解决能源套利问题的理想选择，因其在解决复杂随机序贯问题时表现突出。然而，由于其学得的策略在执行阶段并不能确保安全，RL 在实际应用中较少被采用。本文提出了一个基于RL的新型控制框架，用于电池在不平衡结算机制中制定安全的能源套利策略。在我们提出的控制框架中，代理首先旨在优化套利收入。随后，在后处理阶段，我们基于贴近人类直觉的属性进行知识蒸馏过程，来修正（限制）所学策略。我们的后处理方法是一种通用方法，不局限于能源套利领域。我们使用2023年比利时的不平衡价格来评估我们提出框架的表现。此外，我们在真实电池上部署我们提出的控制框架，展示其在实际环境中的能力。

data.translation: 受到可再生能源源头的不断渗透以及使用单一失衡定价方法的影响，负责平衡的各方面面临着新的机遇。采用无监督再生增强学习(RL)方法，是解决能量套利问题的一种理想选择。尽管RL方法在解决复杂的随机序列问题方面表现出了出色的性能，但是RL方法在实际应用中的使用率却很低，因为它的学习策略并不能确保在执行阶段的安全性。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的RL控制框架，用来针对储能系统进行能量套利。在我们的控制框架中，初始的控制目标是优化能源套利收益。在后处理阶段，我们通过将学习过程中获得的知识进行知识捕捉，并以人类的直觉为基础，对学习策略进行修正。我们的后处理阶段是一种综合性的方法，不仅能用于能量套利问题，还可以用于其他领域。我们以2023年的比利时失衡价格作为评估指标，并将该方法应用于真实的储能系统中，以证明其在实际应用中的实用性。

value.text: 根据遵循人类直觉的属性

data.text: A continuous rise in the penetration of renewable energy sources, along with the use of the single imbalance pricing, provides a new opportunity for balance responsible parties to reduce their cost through energy arbitrage in the imbalance settlement mechanism. Model-free reinforcement learning (RL) methods are an appropriate choice for solving the energy arbitrage problem due to their outstanding performance in solving complex stochastic sequential problems. However, RL is rarely deployed in real-world applications since its learned policy does not necessarily guarantee safety during the execution phase. In this paper, we propose a new RL-based control framework for batteries to obtain a safe energy arbitrage strategy in the imbalance settlement mechanism. In our proposed control framework, the agent initially aims to optimize the arbitrage revenue. Subsequently, in the post-processing step, we correct (constrain) the learned policy following a knowledge distillation process based on properties that follow human intuition. Our post-processing step is a generic method and is not restricted to the energy arbitrage domain. We use the Belgian imbalance price of 2023 to evaluate the performance of our proposed framework. Furthermore, we deploy our proposed control framework on a real battery to show its capability in the real world.
data.translation: 可再生能源渗透率的持续增长，以及单一失衡定价的使用，为平衡负责方通过失衡结算机制中的能源套利降低成本提供了新的机会。模型自由的强化学习（RL）方法是解决能源套利问题的合适选择，因为它们在解决复杂随机序列问题方面表现出色。然而，由于学习到的策略在执行阶段不一定能保证安全，RL很少在实际应用中部署。在本文中，我们提出了一个新的基于RL的电池控制框架，以在失衡结算机制中获得一个安全的能源套利策略。在我们提出的控制框架中，代理最初旨在优化套利收入。随后，在后处理步骤中，我们根据遵循人类直觉的属性，通过知识提炼过程对学习到的策略进行修正（约束）。我们的后处理步骤是一种通用方法，不限于能源套利领域。我们使用2023年比利时失衡价格来评估我们提出的框架的性能。此外，我们在真实电池上部署了我们提出的控制框架，以展示其在现实世界中的能力。

value.text: 我们部署我们提出的控制框架在一个真实的电池上

Model-free reinforcement learning (RL) methods are an appropriate choice for solving the energy arbitrage problem due to their outstanding performance in solving complex stochastic sequential problems. In our proposed control framework, the agent initially aims to optimize the arbitrage revenue. Subsequently, in the post-processing step, we correct (constrain) the learned policy following a knowledge distillation process based on properties that follow human intuition. data.translation: 可再生能源渗透率的持续上升，以及单一失衡定价机制的应用，为平衡负责方通过失衡结算机制进行能源套利以降低成本提供了新机遇。无模型的强化学习（RL）方法适用于解决能源套利问题，因为它们在处理复杂的随机序列问题方面具有卓越表现。然而，由于RL在执行阶段学习到的策略不能保证绝对安全，它很少被应用于实际场景。本文中，我们提出了一个基于RL的新电池控制框架，旨在失衡结算机制中实现安全的能源套利策略。在我们的控制框架中，系统一开始主要目标是优化套利收益。在后处理阶段，我们根据符合人类直觉的特性，通过知识蒸馏过程对学习到的策略进行了修正和约束。我们的后处理步骤是一种通用方法，并不局限于能源套利领域。我们利用2023年的比利时失衡定价数据来评估我们框架的性能。此外，我们还在一块真实电池上实施了这一控制框架，以展示其在现实世界中的应用效果。
